attributes.additional_details: Please sign to show your support
attributes.background:
Danny has been in jail for 10 years after he was only meant to be serving a 13month sentence! The jail believe they are doing this for his benefit causing Danny to take drastic actions
http://www.chroniclelive.co.uk/news/north-east-news/scotswood-prisoner-danny-weatherston-trapped-11626402

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament are not responsible for releasing people from prison. You could ask the Government to ask the Queen to exercise the prerogative of mercy.

You could also start a new petition calling on Parliament to change the law, to prevent cases like this happening in the future. This is likely to be more effective than asking for a court sentence to be overturned.
